Articles.Content:
Can anyone tell me whats the current version of KSP? has there been an update?

Corporal Vasquez

USCSM / KSCSM 8th BMTS Sulaco
Good morning sir. 0.25 is almost a week old.
Current version is 0.25, the update was made recently (I think over the weekend).

Good morning sir. 0.25 is almost a week old.

Don't call a corporal sir. They work for a livin'. :^)
Why do these kinds of threads keep popping up? Is the website that unclear about which version is current?
